text: Does anyone know when we might be able to associate custom objects via eCom bridge?

Hi, i have a problem with the drag and drop areas in HubSpot themes: i cant resize the columns, the object that works to do that, isnt working :disappointed:. Somebody have the same problem, how i fixit?
For whatever reason it only works if the row fluid and span classes exist
What I did is use the real food and spin classes and then I just rewrote it so that it uses flexbox and that kind of thing

Hi Scott, I am the Product Manager on the Cookie Banner team and we are working on an integration with OneTrust similar to what we did with Cookiebot, it’s still in the works so we are seeing what we can do to get it  ready this quarter!
